seo.title: Medical Spa Software That Pays for Itself in 30 Days
seo.description: All-in-one CRM platform: See website visitors, build patient audiences, automate marketing. Used by 500+ aesthetic practices. Live demo available.
seo.og_image: Platform overview showing all features in a unified dashboard

hero.headline: The Complete Patient Intelligence Platform for Medical Aesthetics
hero.subheadline: One platform that identifies visitors, builds audiences, automates campaigns, and proves ROI - replacing 5+ separate tools.

sections.headline: Everything You Need to Grow Your Practice
sections.subheadline: Stop juggling multiple tools. Get enterprise capabilities in one affordable platform.

features: Track procedure interest and buying intent

features.title: Patient Identification Pixel
features.description: Our HIPAA-compliant pixel identifies up to 80% of your website visitors by name, email, and procedure interest - without forms or cookies.
benefits: See visitor names and contact info instantly
Capture visitors who don't fill out forms

features.title: Audience Intelligence Engine
features.description: Build and target custom patient audiences using 280M+ verified profiles and 60B+ behavioral signals updated weekly.
benefits: Target by procedure interest (Botox, fillers, etc.)
Filter by income, age, and location

features.title: Unified Communications Hub
features.description: Manage all patient communications in one inbox - email, SMS, web chat, and social messages with team collaboration.

features.title: Campaign Activation Center
features.description: Launch targeted campaigns across all channels from one place - email, SMS, social media, and paid advertising.
benefits: One-click audience sync to all platforms

features.title: ROI Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track every dollar from first click to lifetime patient value with attribution modeling and revenue tracking.

features.title: Data Enrichment Service
features.description: Automatically enhance patient records with verified contact information, demographics, and behavioral data.

sections.headline: Connects with Your Existing Tools
sections.subheadline: Seamlessly integrate with practice management, marketing, and advertising platforms

features.title: HIPAA Compliant
features.description: Full HIPAA compliance with BAA included, encrypted data storage, and audit logs

features.title: SOC 2 Type II Certified
features.description: Independently audited security controls and data protection processes

features.title: 256-bit Encryption
features.description: Bank-level encryption for all data in transit and at rest

features.title: 99.9% Uptime SLA
features.description: Guaranteed availability with redundant infrastructure and 24/7 monitoring

timeline.title: Data Import
timeline.description: Import existing patients and enrich records

timeline.title: Team Training
timeline.description: Live training session for your team

sections.headline: Ready to See the Platform in Action?
sections.subheadline: Get a personalized demo and see your actual website visitors
